mapper.insert: insert into goods (g_id, g_name, g_inserttime, g_cost, g_sale, g_Discount, g_Stock, g_service) values (#{gId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gInserttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{gSale,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{gDiscount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{gStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gService,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update goods

g_inserttime = #{gInserttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

g_Discount = #{gDiscount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
g_Stock = #{gStock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
g_service = #{gService,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where g_id = #{gId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
